name: fcoss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3), wf(c0, c4, c3), wf(c1, c2, c4))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c4))
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, c4, c3), wf(c1, c2, c4)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c4))
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, c4, c3), wf(c1, c2, c4)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))

|- wi(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c3))
-| wi(wa(wf(c0, c4, c3), wf(c1, c2, c4)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c5))
-| wi(w0, wss(c5, c4))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wf(c0, c4, c3), wf(c1, c2, c4)), wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wf(ccom(c0, c1), c2, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, c3))
-| wi(w0, wf(c1, c2, c5))
-| wi(w0, wss(c5, c4))

comment: Composition of two mappings. Similar to ~ fco , but with a weaker condition on the domain of ` F ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
